description: Days after his bodybuilding competition, Brad came to my place to show the amazing shape he was in. No doubt this was the perfect time for me to shoot him since he's been voted by you guys, in our recent survey, the model you wanted most to come back. I never impose the mask on my models, but sometimes it helps me convince them to perform for me and do things they normally wouldn't do. I must admit that in Brad's case, I was eager for him to take the mask off. He is such a beautiful man. You would think that a guy like him would start eating and drinking like crazy after his competition. Well not at all, he's already looking forward to next year's competition. I'm glad that we'll be there to follow his progress, both in and out of the gym! ;p
title: Brad Unmasked, Scene #01
